top_comments.comment: Gigi , you have made a new standard for this song! Connecting the peace and the pain. Powerful and timeless.

Ang galing talaga ninyong lahat... pag naumpisahan ko manuod ng youtube channel nyo di kona mapigilan kahit paulit ulit kong panuodin/pakinggan ang galing lang talaga. Nakaka gigi vibes talaga! Kudos to gigi and the band!

comments_since_last_sample.body: ganda ng rendition.. excellent and amazing.. i love it❤❤❤
Live po ba ito or lipsink??
